actions.name: Turboblaze
actions.description: Effect: The user's attacks are unaffected by the abilities of other creatures on the field. When using Fusion Flare, the user may spend an additional 2 PP to also inflict @Affliction[nullified] 5 on one of the target's abilities. If the user uses Blue Flare, the user may spend an additional 2 PP to inflict @Affliction[nullified] 5 on one of the target's abilities as well as inflicting @Affliction[dazzled] 5.
